title: Iron mace

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Iron mace is a mace made of iron. It is the second weakest mace available in the game. It requires level 1 Attack to wield, and can be created by using an iron bar on an anvil (as long as the player has level 17 Smithing). It can be bought at Flynn's Mace Market in Falador.

The Iron mace is a mace made of iron. It is the second weakest mace available in the game. It requires level 1 Attack to wield, and can be created by using an iron bar on an anvil (as long as the player has level 17 Smithing). It can be bought at Flynn's Mace Market in Falador.

It can be found in the Edgeville jail and in a house to the east of the Ardougne market.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The mace's attack speed has been decreased from 5 (every 3.0 seconds) to 4 (every 2.4 seconds).

[[File:Iron mace detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''Iron mace''' is a [[mace]] made of [[iron equipment|iron]]. It is the second weakest mace available in the game. It requires level 1 [[Attack]] to wield, and can be created by using an [[iron bar]] on an anvil (as long as the player has level 17 [[Smithing]]). It can be bought at [[Flynn's Mace Market]] in [[Falador]].

It can be found in the [[Edgeville]] jail and in a house to the east of the [[Ardougne market]].
